text:
@realDonaldTrump This is all on you...

You failed to get a head start on covid19 and called it a hoax..

The economy crashed kuz people couldn't work..

This was a powder keg waiting to ignite all on your watch..

Like dictator regimes...

When all isnt well, it ignites
